title: Five unsolved murders in 'The Most Beautiful Small Town in America,' Bardstown
itunes:title: Five unsolved murders in 'The Most Beautiful Small Town in America,' Bardstown
description:
Since 2013, there have been four murders and one disappearance in a small Kentucky town. The person who disappeared is presumed dead. Nancy Grace goes in-depth with the producer and co-host of the podcast "Bardstown," Jessica Noll. Investigative reporter Shay McAlister of WHAS reveals a new release of all their collective information and evidence in these cases.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
